# 0.27.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    sha256 = "db89135f4d1eaa047b9f5518ba4037284b43fc87386d08c1d1fe91708e3730ae",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.27.0/rules_rust-v0.27.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Add `experimental_symlink_execroot` for `cargo_build_script`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2085
* Fix doc for proc_macro_deps attr by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2095
* Fix typo in rust_proto documentation by @ryanpbrewster in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2099
* Make proc macros' "data" available in compile_data of crates that use macro by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2097
* Update platforms by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2111
* Option to generate extra targets with crate_universe by @adsnaider in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2103
* Remove `mandatory = True` from the `prost_plugin_flag` attribute in `rust_prost_toolchain`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2110
* Cleanup args construction by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2122
* Add crate_name attribute by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2118
* Make @using_cxx example buildable on Windows by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2114
* Fix rust_doc_test dependency to allow either rust_library or cc_library by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2112
* Read default annotation values from package's Cargo.toml metadata by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2124
* Fill in some crate metadata for publishing cargo-bazel to crates.io by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2132
* Add TemplateVariableInfo for build script toolchains attribute. by @granaghan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2123
* Fix a typo in the `rust_proto` documentation. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2109
* Flip experimental_use_coverage_metadata_files by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2128
* Added Rust 1.72.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2127
* crate_universe: Allow platform-specific build script env vars by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2139
* Update rules_apple by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2137
* Release 0.27.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2130

## New Contributors
* @ryanpbrewster made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2099
* @adsnaider made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2103
* @dzbarsky made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2122
* @HackAttack made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2112

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.26.0...0.27.0

## What's Changed
* Have the prost process wrapper print warnings to stderr by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2053
* Enable rustfmt in bindgen toolchains by default by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2055
* Removed legacy `//proto:*.bzl` files and updated docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2057
* Improve handling of build.rs link dependencies by @coffinmatician in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1970
* Add `opt_level` argument to `rust_repository_set`. by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2036
* Update dependencies versions by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2064
* Updated wasm-bindgen dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2066
* Update rust_analyzer dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2065
* Updated crate_universe dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2063
* Disable zig cross compiling example by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2081
* Added Rust 1.71.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2062
* Add a clang-format check in CI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2077
* Remove cfg exec from linker_scripts attribute. by @granaghan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2070
* Add support for split_coverage_post_processing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2000
* Remove unnecessary eval to fix PATH variables containing a space by @belak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2087
* Release 0.26.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2083

## New Contributors
* @coffinmatician made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1970
* @granaghan made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2070
* @belak made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2087

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.25.1...0.26.0

## What's Changed
* Allow sysroots from cc_toolchains to be added to bindgen actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2024
* Eliminate Rustfmt action in Bindgen rules. Bindgen can run rustfmt by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2025
* Exclude .tmp_git_root from globs by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1948
* Fix flaky coverage test in CI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2028
* Re-enable zig example on CI by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2030
* fix: `crate_type` more accurately corresponds to CC linking actions by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1975
* Add Prost and Tonic rules. by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2033
* Release 0.25.0 by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2042


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.24.1...0.25.0

## What's Changed
* Update bindgen version to 0.65.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2008

* Make `rust_doc_test` inherit it's crate aliases attribute by @k1nkreet in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2007
* feature: `target_compatible_with` added to `CommonAttrs` by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1976
* fix: load cargo manifest without resolving abs path of deps by @liningpan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2017
* Fix crate_universe's `all_crate_deps` and `aliases` functions failing in case the crate's Cargo.toml has condtional dependencies by @k1nkreet in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2018
* Rust library group by @william-smith-skydio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1848
* Release v0.24.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2020

## What's Changed
* Symlink in the exec-root so that relative paths will work, unchanged. by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1781

* Fixes crates_vendor workspace name detection when using bzlmod by @csmulhern in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1990
* Added Rust 1.70.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1991
* Add support for armv8-m by @afoxley in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1993
* Update stardoc version by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1997
* Update various bash scripts to pipe errors to stderr by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1999
* Split up cargo_build_script tests by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2002
* Update bindgen rules to build clang from source. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1998
* Minor CI and test cleanup by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2004
* Fix code coverage collection. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2001
* Release 0.23.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2003

## What's Changed
* Added tests for build script dependencies to crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1943
* Rename crates_vendor_manifests to cvm to shorten windows path lengths by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1944
* Support for `no_std` mode by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1934
* Add T2 support for thumbv7em-none-eabi by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1957
* Removed `rust_toolchain.os` in favor of `rust_toolchain.exec_triple`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1960
* feature: expose `extra_rustc_flags` and `extra_exec_rustc_flags` at `rust_register_toolchains` by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1959
* fix: lld-link (MSVC) fix flags including `-l` prefix by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1958
* Add T2 support for x86_64-unknown-none by @amari in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1967
* Update rules_apple in tests by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1972
* Allow specifying exec and target compatibility constraints by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1971
* Release 0.22.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1974

## New Contributors


Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup

## Breaking Changes

- `rust_toolchain.target_json` changed from a label to a string. Users can either move their existing json files into Starlark dicts or convert the sources on the fly with a repository rule (an example can be found in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810)


## What's Changed
* Unify functions for computing constraint values for platform triple abi by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1805
* Updated platform triple values from strings to structs ("triple") by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1804
* Convert `rust_toolchain` attrs `exec_triple` and `target_triple` to structs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1808
* Delete `rust_toolchain.rusrc_srcs` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1807
* Disable job in CI to avoid infrastructure failure. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1816
* Added tests for the `triple` constructor by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1811
* Use correct dynamic link args fro proc-macro crates by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1803
* support `resolver = "2"` target-specific features by @wmatthews-google in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1710
* Updated `rust_toolchain.target_json` to take encoded json strings by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1810
* Use env method recently added to cargo_metadata by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1813
* Fixes resolver issue with root packages and another dependency format by @Dig-Doug in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1819
* Encapsulate running cargo into a struct by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1815
* Instructions on how to perform `rustfmt` check (#1822) by @fmorency in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1823
* Added update known shas to include T1-T2 triples by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1824
* Various cleanups by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1828
* Updated rules_rust to version 0.18.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1829

* Convert BUILD.$name-$version.bazel from tera to serde_starlark by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1743

* Make loads from @rules_rust//rust:defs.bzl come out on one line by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1753
* Don't propagate `compatible_with` to the underlying `cargo_build_script` `rust_binary` target by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1754
* Remove unnecessary binary file by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1755
* Updated rules_rust to version `0.16.0` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1750

* "sandwich" rlibs between native deps in linker order by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1333
* Revert "Replace slashes with underscores in default crate names." by @cfredric in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1335
* Replace slashes with underscores in default crate names. by @cfredric in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1336
* remove experimental_use_whole_archive_for_native_deps by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1338
* Add support for riscv32 targets by @cfrantz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1323
* Build `rust_test` targets with `crate` using the same crate name as the underlying library target. by @cfredric in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1332
* Remove unnecessary `crate_name` usage in `rust_test_suite`. by @cfredric in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1345
* Temporarily disable windows job in CI. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1352
* Added support for Rust 1.61.0 to crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1348
* Update apple_support by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1346
* Fixed fetch_shas script to correctly include .gz and .xz extensions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1355
* Added Rust 1.61.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1347
* Updated rust_bindgen dependencies API by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1354
* Add developing notes for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1351
* Ensure memchr is linked after libobject by @bsilver8192 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1349
* feat: build script toolchains annotations by @roman-kashitsyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1344
* Fixed missing docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1358
* Don't leak native dependencies of proc_macro by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1359
* crate_universe: fix typo by @leoluk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1314
* Updated `rules_rust` version to `0.5.0` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1360

# 0.4.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    sha256 = "edb87c0d2ba70823fe3df7862676d695599314a4634b9758bd55f0e8f19c2751",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.4.0/rules_rust-v0.4.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Make get_host_triple public to get a triple from Bazel's repository_ctx by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1289
* Remove `triple` field from triple struct in favor of `str` by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1297
* Use __EXEC_ROOT__ paths for genfiles in rust_analyzer aspect by @csmulhern in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1293
* rustc: fix a conditional by @gburgessiv in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1300
* Updated crate_universe docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1301
* fix for using a nightly channel after commit 841fc6fb82141576d91aecb1d3f2656d58b0ab71 by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1302
* Don't emit `CrateInfo` from `rust_static_library` and `rust_shared_library` by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1298
* Don't propagate non-shared transitive linker inputs from `rust_static|shared_library` by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1299
* Remove doc about STATIC_RUST_URL env var. by @wt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1306
* Use tinyjson from crates.io instead of github.com. by @wt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1309
* Address warnings for example/test dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1312
* crate_universe: Improved documentation by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1305
* Add bazel-* directories in cargo_manifest_dir/external_crate to gitignore by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1279
* Add support for aarch64-apple-ios-sim by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1304
* Prevents running of clippy on bindgen targets by @csmulhern in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1320
* Updated wasm_bindgen rules to only require core `rules_nodejs` rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1311
* Updated wasm_bindgen dependencies API by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1313
* Error calling `all_crate_deps` without `Cargo.toml` by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1327
* Support . workspace member by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1326
* Bump version to 0.4.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1329
